Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4925 INDIANA AVENUE, LISLE, Illinois, 60532, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CTS Corp operates in the electronics industry. The company is a global manufacturer of Sensors, Electronic components, and Actuators. It designs, manufacture, and sell a broad line of sensors, electronic components, and actuators primarily to original equipment manufacturers (OEM) for the aerospace and defense, industrial, information technology, medical, telecommunications, and transportation markets. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from the United States and also has a presence in China; Singapore; the Czech Republic; Taiwan and other countries.
